name: Hortimus: the game DEMO
description:
THIS IS NOT THE FULL GAME!

It is only a prototype for a larger concept!

Hortimus: The Game is going to be my most ambitious project yet, The storyline is about 2 different planets, the hortimus alphas and primes, going at it, based off of comics me and my friends draw.

I plan to have a story mode, 2-player Co-op and PVP, secret unlockable stories, more heroes, and unique abilities.

Once it is done I will upload to my itch.io for FREE!

Thank you so much for playing, and remember, this is only a prototype!

UPDATE 2021-07-06: courtesy of Enchilada games, we now have some cool music in game
